original_title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: High-Speed Adventures
overview: Let's blaaaze into 4 high-speed races with the Monster Machines! Help Blaze and AJ use adhesion to stop Zeg from bouncing away, and acceleration to get Darington to the Stuntmania Super Track. Plus, win a sailboat race with the right parts and wind power, and even team up with Pickle for Team Truck Challenge Day!
title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: High-Speed Adventures
